314b7: zhes bya bar ston to/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du byin pa'i 'jig
314b8: rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong
315a1: pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
315a2: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
315a3: to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
315a4: to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
315a5: zhes bya bar ston to/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// theg pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
315a6: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi/
315a7: 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi/
315a8: mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
315b1: bya bar ston to/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sbyong pa zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
315b2: zhes bya bar ston to/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos
315b3: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi
315b4: 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig
315b5: rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam
315b6: yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
315b7: ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
315b8: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i
316a1: ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
316a2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par
316a3: shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//
316a4: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
316a5: stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos
316a6: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos
316a7: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rgyun du
316a8: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
316b1: zhes bya bar ston to/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
316b2: nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med
316b3: ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes
316b4: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig
316b5: rten zhi zhes bya bar ston zhe na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
316b6: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi
316b7: zhes bya bar ston to/ / sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten zhi
316b8: zhes bya bar ston to/ / gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten zhi
317a1: zhes bya bar ston to/ / reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
317a2: ston to/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
317a3: ston to/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
317a4: bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
317a5: bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
317a6: 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
317a7: ston to/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yid kyi
317a8: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
317b1: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i
317b2: khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes
317b3: bya bar ston to/ / ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i
317b4: 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// skye
317b5: ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
317b6: pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
317b7: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
317b8: bya bar ston to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
318a1: ston to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
318a2: shi zhes bya bar ston to/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// thog ma dang tha ma
318a3: med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston
318a4: to/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
318a5: rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo sa
318a6: nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya
318a7: bar ston to/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
318a8: ston to/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i
318b1: bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzugs med
318b2: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
318b3: pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// mngon par shes pa rnams
318b4: kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
318b5: stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//
318b6: byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes
318b7: bya bar ston to/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
318b8: bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
319a1: nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
319a2: de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
319a3: ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston zhe na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du shes kyi 'jig
319a4: rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi 'jig rten
319a5: stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// /
319a6: lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sgra'i 'jig
319a7: rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
319a8: ston to/ / chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa
319b1: nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus kyi rnam par
319b2: shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
319b3: bya bar ston to/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
319b4: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
319b5: to/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
319b6: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lus
319b7: kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sa'i
319b8: khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// me'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rlung
320a1: gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig
320a2: rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig
320a3: rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// reg pa'i
320a4: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// len pa'i 'jig rten stong
320a5: pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
320a6: ston to/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bzod pa'i pha
320a7: rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
320a8: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
320b1: ston to/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa
320b2: nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'dus byas
320b3: stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
320b4: stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
320b5: ston to/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
320b6: kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
320b7: ston to/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
320b8: rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong
321a1: pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// byang
321a2: chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// 'phags pa'i
321a3: bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong
321a4: pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
321a5: ces bya bar ston to/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
321a6: med pa dang smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi
321a7: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
321a8: ces bya bar ston to/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//
321b1: byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi
321b2: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid
321b3: ces bya bar ston to/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rang byang chub kyi
321b4: 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
321b5: ces bya bar ston to/ / rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyod cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// /
321b6: shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyis brgya bcu gnyis pa// // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar
321b7: ston ces na/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
321b8: ltangar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i tshe ba de lta bu med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
322a1: rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar
322a2: gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad tu nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
322a3: 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad tu nye bar gnas so/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad tu nye bar gnas
322a4: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so//
322a5: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir
322a6: nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam
322a7: pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin
322a8: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs
322b1: su ba gtang ba'i don to/ / rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen
322b2: bo'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang //
322b3: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin
322b4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du
322b5: phyin pa don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
322b6: nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
322b7: du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes
322b8: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams//
323a1: cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med de/ sus kyang gzhal bar mi nus so// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs
323a2: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de ni gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa don mi
323a3: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas
323a4: mnyam pa yang su yang med na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
323a5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
323a6: dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
323a7: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
323a8: nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/ / rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med gzhal du
323b1: med de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshe rab
323b2: yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ rmi
323b3: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang
323b4: bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
323b5: pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor rna ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
323b6: tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
323b7: 'byor lus kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa
323b8: ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sgra yang
324a1: bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dri yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
324a2: pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ro yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor reg kyang bsam
324a3: gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
324a4: mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes
324a5: pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
324a6: du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
324a7: pa'o/ / rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa
324a8: yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
324b1: du med pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
324b2: pa'o/ / rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa
324b3: yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ me mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
324b4: gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
324b5: mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab
324b6: 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg
324b7: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
324b8: yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab
325a1: dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
325a2: tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sa'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
325a3: mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor chu'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me do gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor me'i khams kyang bsam gyis
325a4: mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
325a5: pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par
325a6: shes pa'i khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ma rig pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
325a7: tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med go zhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
325a8: pa'o/ / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs kyang bsam
325b1: gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched drug kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
325b2: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor reg pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ maM many+dzum pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tsher ba yang bsam
325b3: gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sred pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
325b4: pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor len pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor srid pa yang bsam gyis
325b5: mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor skye ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
325b6: pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor rga shi yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
325b7: pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab
325b8: dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol du byon pa yang bsam gyis mi khyabo dpag tu med gzhal du med pa sa//
326a1: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
326a2: pa'o/ / rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
326a3: du phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
326a4: du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
326a5: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
326a6: dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
326a7: dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong
326a8: pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpog tu
326b1: med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
326b2: dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dor ba
326b3: med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
326b4: dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
326b5: pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mi dmigs
326b6: pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
326b7: tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
326b8: pa'o/ / rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar
327a1: gzhag pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bsam
327a2: gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
327a3: pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
327a4: stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
327a5: dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med
327a6: pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
327a7: rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi
327a8: khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med
327b1: gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
327b2: pa'o/ / rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
327b3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa smon pa med pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor
327b4: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
327b5: tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
327b6: pa'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor mi
327b7: 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bsam
327b8: gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
328a1: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//
328a2: rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos mA 'dres pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhol du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rgyun du
328a3: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu me dra gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'odra ba'i 'bros bu yang
328a4: bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bosam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
328a5: med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang
328a6: mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
328a7: nyid kyang bsam gyis mo khyab dpag tu med gra zhal du med pa s+ho/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab
328a8: dpag tu med gzhal du mod pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam
328a9: pa dang mnyam pa'o/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems mi dmigs so// sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so//
328b1: ra gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang ma dmigs sa// rab 'byor char ba bsam gyis mi ltung
328b2: dpag tu ba gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du shes pas mgyis mi khya ba dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mam
328b3: rnas pa yang ba dmigs so/ / sh+'u lpA 'du byud bas ma byas pa thub dashAn tu ma gzhal dri me pa/ prA mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang ma dpags
328b4: 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig bsam gyis mi khyab
328b5: dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ me mnyam pa da mnyam pa ya mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rngab bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mam
328b6: pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor snga bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
328b7: lte bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal

329a7: pa yang mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab

329b7: so/ / rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor

333a6: mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rang byang chub bsam gyis
333a7: mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa
333a8: dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigaso/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom
333b1: ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shig / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
333b2: shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
333b3: 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
333b4: mchis shing / mi ma nyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ cing
333b5: slad du rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu sna bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis//
333b6: shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal tu ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis
333b7: mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
333b8: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
334a1: ci'i slad du skabasam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dri bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
334a2: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu reg bsam gyis mi khyab
334a3: dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
334a4: pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du na ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam
334a5: gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal dum
334a6: mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
334a7: ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag
334a8: du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
334b1: dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab
334b2: dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa mi dmigs
334b3: pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
334b4: ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
334b5: mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te
334b6: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpagatu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab
334b7: dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
334b8: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
335a1: lags/ ci'i slad du sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
335a2: mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
335a3: pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag du ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
335a4: mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
335a5: mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
335a6: mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi
335a7: dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ste/ mched drug bsam gyis
335a8: mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
335b1: dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal dum
335b2: mchis shing/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi mgos pa lags/ nI'i slad du pa
335b3: bsam gyis mi b+ha ba dpag tum mchis gzhal dum mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam po
335b4: mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsam
335b5: kyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
335b6: shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing // mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
335b7: lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyi sa mi
335b8: pag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
336a1: mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis pa zhal du ma mchis
336a2: shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
336a3: pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu stong pa nyid stong pa
336a4: nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
336a5: gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang
336a6: mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shir/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
336a7: du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
336a8: bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags// ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu
336b1: ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing //
336b2: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
336b3: ci'i slad tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
336b4: nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
336b5: mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
336b6: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags//
336b7: ci'i slad tu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dran pa nye bar gnas
336b8: pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma
337a1: mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma pa
337a2: shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig pa
337a3: pa lags/ ci'i slad tu stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag
337a4: rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi
337a5: khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
337a6: du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnya
337a7: pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
337a8: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam
337b1: par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
337b2: 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
337b3: pa dang smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam
337b4: gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
337b5: gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam
337b6: pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmig
337b7: pa lags/ ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyogyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par
337b8: rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
338a1: dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
338a2: mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing
338a3: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang ma
338a4: pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags
338a5: ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam
338a6: gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
338a7: mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa
338a8: dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs
338b1: pa lags/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya bcu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
338b2: rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
338b3: pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
338b4: pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor mig la yang bsam pa dang dag
338b5: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rna ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna la yang bsam pa
338b6: dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lce la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus la yang
338b7: bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
338b8: rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sgra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
339a1: pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
339a2: dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos la yang bsdam pa dang
339a3: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// /
339a4: rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang
339a5: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
339a6: rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag
339a7: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab
339a8: 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang /
339b1: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
339b2: la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// /
339b3: rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang
339b4: bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam ba mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
339b5: mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
339b6: tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
339b7: dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chu'i khams la yang bsam pa dang
339b8: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ma'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rlung gi
340a1: khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
340a2: mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma rig pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag
340a3: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa
340a4: la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ming dang gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig
340a5: so/ / rab 'byor skye mched drug la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
340a6: mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sred pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang
340a7: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor len pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor srid pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag
340a8: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor skye ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rga shi la yang bsam pa
340b1: dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
340b2: rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dag
340b3: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//
340b4: rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang bsam
340b5: pa dang dpag pa dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyi
340b6: stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
340b7: pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa
340b8: dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// /
341a1: rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dag
341a2: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
341a3: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
341a4: dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams
341a5: cad stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
341a6: mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
341a7: yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
341a8: so/ / rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang bsam
341b1: padang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa da mi mnyam pa mi dmig /
341b2: so// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor dbang po rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
341b3: tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan
341b4: lag rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
341b5: dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor bsam
341b6: gtan rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
341b7: pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor rnam par
341b8: thar pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang
342a1: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la yang bsam pa dang
342a2: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// /
342a3: rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
342a4: tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
342a5: so/ / rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang
342a6: bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor byams pa chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs//
342a7: so// rab 'byor snying rje chen po la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la yang
342a8: bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
342b1: pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
342b2: la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dmigs so/ / rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmig
342b3: so/ / rab 'byor rang byang chub la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag
342b4: pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
342b5: so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad tu gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba la bsam pa dang /
342b6: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
342b7: pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
342b8: tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rna ba
343a1: la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa me mig
343a2: pA lags/ ci'i slad du lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang
343a3: mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pA dang
343a4: dprag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
343a5: tu dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu ro la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
343a6: lags/ ci'i slad tu reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu chos la bsdam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang ma
343a7: mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pA dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rna ba'i
343a8: rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag ba dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu sna'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad
343b1: dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lce'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lus
343b2: kyi rnam par shes pa lnga bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu yid kyi rnam par shes pa la byasam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
343b3: dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu mig gi 'dus te reg pa lnga bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rna ba'i 'dus
343b4: te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
343b5: dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lus kyi 'das
343b6: te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
343b7: pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rna ba'i
343b8: 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshod dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba la bsam
344a1: pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshang dang mnyam
344a2: pA drang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa ljags/ / ci'i slad tu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/
344a3: ci'i slad tu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dung mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu sa'i khams la bsam pa dang
344a4: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
344a5: ci'i slad tu me'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang //
344a6: mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpa ga pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rnam pa shes pa'i
344a7: khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
344a8: dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa
344b1: dang tshad dang dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu ming dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i sbrad/
344b2: tu skye mched drug la bsdam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lag sta/ ci'i slad du reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi
344b3: dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu tshor ba la bsum pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ tswi'i slad tu sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
344b4: pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu len pa la bsam pa drang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lpags/ ci'i slad du srid pa la bsam pa dang /
344b5: dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu skye ba la bsdam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
344b6: kun shil bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i skad tu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ba samA pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi
344b7: mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad drung mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod
344b8: pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
345a1: tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
345a2: pa lags/ ci'i slad tu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa
345a3: dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu phyi
345a4: nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pA dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
345a5: pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa
345a6: dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa
345a7: lags/ ci'i srad tu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tsha dang nga mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lnga bsam
345a8: ba dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
345b1: pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i sbed tu rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam
345b2: pa dang dpag pa dang chad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa me dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ba samA pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi me
345b3: pa lags/ ci'i slad tu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsnam pa dang dpag po dang dzAd dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med legs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu me dmigs pa stong pa nyid
345b4: la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam ba mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lnga bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang banyam pa dang mi
345b5: mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ ci'i slad tu dngos po med pa'i
